```{python}
with open("alice.txt", "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
    alice = f.read()
```

```{python}
with open("mansfield_park.txt", "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
    mans = f.read()
```

```{python}
import re

mans_words = re.split(r"[\s\W]+", mans)
mans_words = [w for w in mans_words if w]
mans_clean = [w.lower() for w in mans_words]

alice_words = re.split(r"[\s\W]+", alice)
alice_words = [w for w in alice_words if w]
alice_clean = [w.lower() for w in alice_words]

print(mans_clean[:50])
print(alice_clean[:50])
```

```{python}

print("There are", len(mans_clean), "words in Mansfield Park txt.")
print("There are", len(alice_clean), "words in Alice In Wonderland.txt")

mans_unique = []
alice_unique = []

for wd in mans_clean:
  if wd not in mans_unique:
    mans_unique.append(wd)
    
for wd in alice_clean:
  if wd not in alice_unique:
    alice_unique.append(wd)
    
print("Unique words in Mansfield Park:", len(mans_unique))
print("Unique words in Alice in Wonderland:", len(alice_unique))
```

```{python}
mans_avg = sum(len(w) for w in mans_clean) / len(mans_clean)
alice_avg = sum(len(w) for w in alice_clean) / len(alice_clean)

print("Average word length in Mansfield Park:", round(mans_avg, 2))
print("Average word length in Alice in Wonderland:", round(alice_avg, 2))
```

```{python}
affixes_mans = {
    "adverbs (-ly)": [w for w in mans_clean if w.endswith("ly")],
    "prefix un-": [w for w in mans_clean if w.startswith("un")],

}

for label, words in affixes_mans.items():

affixes_alice = {
    "adverbs (-ly)": [w for w in alice_clean if w.endswith("ly")],
    "prefix un-": [w for w in alice_clean if w.startswith("un")],
    "suffix -ness": [w for w in alice_clean if w.endswith("ness")],
    "prefix re-": [w for w in alice_clean if w.startswith("re")]
}

for label, words in affixes_alice.items():
    print(f"Alice in Wonderland {label}: {len(words)}")
```

```{python}
quot_list = ['"', '“', '”']

mans_dialogue = sum(mans.count(q) for q in quot_list)
alice_dialogue = sum(alice.count(q) for q in quot_list)

print("Dialogue in Mansfield Park:", mans_dialogue)
print("Dialogue in Alice in Wonderland:", alice_dialogue)
```

```{python}
def word_freq(wordlist):
    freq = {}
    for w in wordlist:
        freq[w] = freq.get(w, 0) + 1
    return freq

# Count frequencies
mans_freq = word_freq(mans_clean)
alice_freq = word_freq(alice_clean)

# Remove common stopwords
for stop in ["the", "and", "of"]:
    mans_freq.pop(stop, None)
    alice_freq.pop(stop, None)

# Sort by most frequent
mans_sorted = sorted(mans_freq.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
alice_sorted = sorted(alice_freq.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)

print("Top 20 words in Mansfield Park:", mans_sorted[:20])
print("Top 20 words in Alice in Wonderland:", alice_sorted[:20])

```
